description: This Dashboard provides a general overview of a Linux system, with templating to host and Interval

targets.query: SELECT last("status") FROM "http_pihole" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT count("id") FROM "pihole-FTL" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "domain"
SELECT count("id") FROM "pihole-FTL" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "domain"
SELECT count("id") FROM "pihole-FTL" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "domain"
SELECT count("id") FROM "pihole-FTL" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "domain"
SELECT mean("cpu")  / 1000 FROM "exec_pi_temp" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") - mean("free") FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

title: Pi Hole
